title: [Cinemagazine items]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Tall timbers - Kauri forests in Western Australia. 2. Wings in the blue - Gliding. 3. Aces to kings - Collection of international playing cards. 4. Man and motion - Australian Grand Prix. Narrated by Geoff McComas.
